label: uncl4509
comment: Code specifying the reason for a response to a request for credit cover.

values.label: Requested financial information not provided
values.comment: Party requested has not provided financial information.

values.label: No financial information available
values.comment: No financial information is available on buyer.

values.label: Debtor is not registered
values.comment: Debtor is not formally registered as legal entity.

values.label: Debtor is non-trading company
values.comment: Debtor without trading, e.g. holding company.

values.label: Only insolvency risk covered
values.comment: Only the risk of insolvency is covered.

values.label: Subject to acceptance of bill of exchange
values.comment: Limit cover conditional to buyer's acceptance of bill of exchange.

values.label: Document against acceptance
values.comment: Limit given on documents against acceptance terms.

values.label: Document against payment
values.comment: Limit given on documents against payment terms.

values.label: Adverse information is publicly available
values.comment: Adverse information on buyer is publicly available.

values.label: Credit limit full
values.comment: No approval or increase in credit possible.

values.label: Lack of turnover
values.comment: Limit reduced. E.g. cancelled due to absence of activity.
